A Bit of Optimism

An inspiring podcast with Simon Sinek

Share with a friend

Latest episode

The Future You Avoid Is Riskier Than the One You Face
with LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman

Subscribe at

  • Spotify

Join me as I talk with people that inspire me about love, life, leadership, and silver linings. The hope is that we all leave with something I think we need these days… A Bit of Optimism. 

Thanks for listening.
